title.narrative: Suva-Nausori Water Supply and Sewerage Project (Supplementary Loan)

description.narrative: The objective of the project is to assist human and economic development in Fiji through the development of water supply and sewerage services in the Suva and Nausori urban areas. A new water source will be developed, water treatment plants will be extended and rehabilitated, and pipelines and distribution systems will be developed; sewerage pumping stations and trunk services will be rehabilitated, and sewerage networks will be extended. The project will provide water and sewerage services of a standard that is suitable for commercialized operations, and will complement institutional developments that are being assisted by the Bank.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Increased coverage and improved delivery of water supply and sewerage services to the residents of the Suva Nausori area.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Access to sewerage service increases from 110,000 (base year 2005) to 140,000 by 2013

description.narrative: Increased coverage and improved delivery of water supply and sewerage services to the residents of the Suva Nausori area.

title.narrative: Uncontrolled overflows from the sewer network decreases from more than1,200 per year (base year 2008) to less than 500 by 2013

description.narrative: Increased coverage and improved delivery of water supply and sewerage services to the residents of the Suva Nausori area.

title.narrative: Number of unplanned water service interruptions decreases from more than 2,000 per year (base year 2005) to less than 800 by 2013

description.narrative: Increased coverage and improved delivery of water supply and sewerage services to the residents of the Suva Nausori area.

title.narrative: Reduction in unaccounted for water from 55% of water produced (base year 2005 to 30% by 2013

description.narrative: Increased coverage and improved delivery of water supply and sewerage services to the residents of the Suva Nausori area.

title.narrative: Access to water services increases from 97% (base year 2005) to 99% of the Suva-Nausori population by 2013

description.narrative: Increased coverage and improved delivery of water supply and sewerage services to the residents of the Suva Nausori area.

title.narrative: 100% of samples extracted from the regional water supply network meet World Health Organization guidelines by 2013 (baseline: 99% in 2005)

description.narrative: Increased coverage and improved delivery of water supply and sewerage services to the residents of the Suva Nausori area.
